website_summaries.verdict: A cost-efficient space saver with enough intuitive features to satisfy basic laundry needs.
pros: Includes "Wrinkle Guard" feature and sensor to prevent over- or under-drying
Hardy tub is made of strong stainless steel
Clear washer lid gives users a view of the inside
cons: The washer lid may be tricky to close

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised ..
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is perfect. The lid lock is a little tricky and flimsy but a small flaw. It does the job quickly and quietly. The dryer is excellent!! And the service for delivery and installation was unparalleled. For being a new home owner not really knowing what’s going on I was really impressed :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine! It gets our clothing much cleaner than the older GE we had. Our appliance repairman told us not to get another GE--that they were cr*p now. He recommended Kenmore or Whirlpool. The installation was perfect--the installers were on time, polite, and had all of the necessary parts and expertise. Amazon is definitely the way to go when ordering appliances after you have checked them out in person and via reviews. Cheaper, faster, easier. Who knew? Thank you, Amazon and Kenmore!
customer_reviews.author: Coastal CA

customer_reviews.title: Great little washer and dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great little washer and dryer!! Fits so nicely in my small laundry room/pantry! I can't do large loads anymore, but since there's just 2 of us here now, that's fine. They actually wash and dry better than my full size front loading Amana 's that I had in there prior. A little pricey, but frees up so much space! I defenitely recommend if you don't have room Larger appliances.
customer_reviews.author: MaryG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product SUCKS. It all stems from the fact that you can not do anything with your laundry unless the damn lid is closed!!! So how can you do anything when you can't open the lid? It is STUPID... I detached the lid mechanism so the lid stays in closed mode and taped it down. The machine is noisy and slow to respond to input. BTW it came with NO instructions or warranty. If it wasn't for the space saving aspect and the fact that all the electrical and vent connections have all been moved to accommodate this sick joke of an appliance, I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: g. philemon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Model 61732 Delivered 1 week ago. Delivered on time. Installation was smooth and fast. They hauled away the old unit. It's working nicely. The high capacity washer saves precious time and the unit fits in my tiny utility space. It's my first stacked appliance. I would have liked a different color but I still love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy the 240 volt electric cord.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this duo. The washer cleans well with multiple options. The cycle time is longer than I'm used to. The dryer is great and is very fast. Don't be surprised as I was. You will need to purchase a 240 volt 3 wire electric cord. It is not included! They're about $7-8. I already had the dryer vent hose but you may need that also. Otherwise, I am very pleased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: lolacat

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Actually really love the unit. Delivery and set up was seamless. Only thing is the washer makes much more noise than my old unit. There are intermitent banging sounds. Other than that, have been using a few months and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Angela Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, and a terrific working machine.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a $2000 Maytag set. Every thing about delivery from Amazon was fantastic.Living in a rural area sears would deliver for$50, then would have charged $50 to remove two appliances, the new power cord $69. New dryer vent$15., and new water hoses$29. for a total of almost $215. Sears also didn’t offer installation in my area . All these were included free with Amazon and we’re done expertly! The washer works great and the clothes come out almost dry. The dryer is equally great, drying clothes in half the time my old Maytag did.I highly recommend the Kenmore laundry center as it is a superior piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: MARIAN KOZUCH

customer_reviews.title: Balance issues and the locking top is a a bit.of a problem
customer_reviews.text: This laundry center cleans very well. It.is very loud and washing anything other than clothes seems to be a bit of a challenge. It had balance issues if the load is not exactly right and it takes a long period of time for the washer to unlock to fix the unbalance issue.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was on time, and crew were courteous and professional.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the follow-through. After determining that a doorway would need to be enlarged before the installation could be completed, I was told I had 30 days to call them again once the doorway had been dealt with, and they would complete the installation. Once that was done, we made the follow-up appointment and they were once again on time and professional in the completion of their installation. Great follow-through.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D. Duling

customer_reviews.title: Dryer is AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this washer/dryer set for my rental because Kenmore used to be a good brand. They are now on their third, that's right, the original set was bad, the second dryer burned and ruined clothing, and now the third dryer is doing the same. The washer is good but the dryer is AWFUL!! I'm having my tenant call to return the machines for a refund. I'm very disappointed in the Kenmore brand.
customer_reviews.author: Helene L. Browne

customer_reviews.title: A real space saver...it fit into our very small shelf area in our master bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: For "aging in place", this washer/dryer was an important addition to our master bathroom. The only feature I would change is to add a soap dispenser. Otherwise, it works as well as our regular washer and dryer in our far away basement! I recommend it wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Lint screen error prevents the dryer from completing a cycle. Also very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Garyle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good! And looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome washer and dryer. Works perfectly and fast. Big machine although occupied very little space. The only thing that I don’t like is that the dryer filter is very small and with some towels you have to clean it before finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Barroso

customer_reviews.title: check thT Ll parts needed are available
customer_reviews.text: The proper electrical three prong cord was not delivered. The driver said it would require an electrician to replace electrical cord. I am not happy. The product describes that a three prong cord would be available.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Durable, quite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cleaning company office & it’s so perfect! Smaller loads for sure but can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Washes well.
customer_reviews.text: Washer does a very good job and holds a lot of clothes for a stacking unit. Wish the dryer had a cool-down cycle for permanent press. Also the dryer has a very small lint filter, not really adequate for a load of towels.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: HATE WASHER LID LOCK
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE LOVES THE DRYER EXCEPT THE LENT SENOR COME ON TOO OFTEN. THE WASHER DOES A GOOD JOB BUT SHE HATES THE LID LOCK WHICH WON'T ALLOW HER TO ADD ANYTHING AFTER THE PROCESS BEGINS. REGRETTABLY, WE WILL HAVE TO RETURN THIS ITEM UNLESS THE LID LOCK FEATURE CAN BE BYPASSED. CALLED KENMORE AT 844-553-6667 TODAY BUT THEY ARE NOT AVAILABLE ON SATURDAY.
customer_reviews.author: Evie white

customer_reviews.title: Terrible machine-piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Any more than 3 towels and it won't spin or rinse
customer_reviews.author: David  Markman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small unit for work. Went on sale 1 week after I purchased. Amazon delivery was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark isley

customer_reviews.title: installation was not done as advertised
customer_reviews.text: washer and dryer are excellent, however installation was not done as advertised
customer_reviews.author: William Preston

customer_reviews.title: There is a deadline to return and it's less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I hate this washer/dryer. The washer is really noisy. The dryer doesn't dry clothes evenly and everything comes out wrinkled!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce LeMire

customer_reviews.title: Good washer for the price!  Lots of photos added here.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the washer! There were not good photos online showing how the dryer vent connects so I added a bunch of photos here.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from Sears
customer_reviews.text: This unit hasn't worked (will not go through spin cycle) since we bought it 6 months ago. Since then, Sears has sent out 4 separate technicians who have not been able to fix and now they tell me they need to come out 4 more times before they will replace. They even lied about what the last technician said which was it needed to be replaced, of which they said it was working when the technician left the house. I doubt Sears or Kenmore will ever give us a working unit. They will continue to put barriers up to or lie as to the technicians findings. I am at wits end.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Run away, don't look back
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these in June 2019, it's now February 2020 and the machine has broken down. We were just notified that the needed part has an ETA of JUNE! Needless to say, Kenmore will be hearing more about this.
customer_reviews.author: Ccolor

customer_reviews.title: Lemon washer/dryer Kenmore combo
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine directly from Sears. Failed memory board first month. They are replacing board in about 2 weeks. Thankful for extended warranty on my lemon
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of useless garbage. There is a design flaw with this machine. It senses an unbalanced load very often and when it does you have to wait 10 minutes for door to unlock then have to start cycle all over again. Time waster!! Do not purchase this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Does it automatically come with ever thing for install
customer_reviews.text: Does the supplies to install it come with it ounce you purchase it?
customer_reviews.author: JustinW

product_meta.title: Kenmore 81452 24" 1.6 cu. ft. 240V Electric Laundry Center, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: This Kenmore electric laundry center has been designed for smaller spaces but still provides big cleaning and drying performance. The 1.6 cu. ft. washer features a durable stainless steel basket and a dual action impeller that moves clothes in different directions delivering gentle yet thorough cleaning. The 3.4 cu. ft. dryer senses when fabrics are dry, eliminating over-drying and reducing additional wear-and-tear. After the drying is complete, the Wrinkle Guard option periodically tumbles clothes for up to 40 minutes to keep fresh and wrinkle-free. Additional features include a fabric softener dispenser and a soft-close tempered glass lid that has been designed to close gently.
feature_bullets: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout.
1.6 cu. ft. washer with a Soft-Close Glass Lid designed to close gently.
Dual action impeller thoroughly yet gently cleans everything from dirty workwear to delicates.
Durable stainless steel wash tub resists odors and won’t snag fabrics.
Wrinkle guard periodically tumbles clothes to keep clothes fresh.
Convenient dispensing system delivers fabric softener and/or bleach at just the right time so you don't have to.
Space-saving design fits in closets, laundry rooms, and smaller spaces. Overall dimensions: 23.88”W x 74.25” H X 26. D 26.63"D. Depth with door open 90° is 36.44”

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
